feed.title: contributor.info Changelog
feed.subtitle: All notable changes to contributor.info - the platform for understanding open source repository health and dynamics.

entry.title: Version 4.33.0 - 2026-01-17
entry.content:
Version 4.33.0

Released on 2026-01-17

üöÄ Features

  • **ui:** enhance CopyButton feedback and standardize usage ([#1610](https://github.com/bdougie/contributor.info/issues/1610)) ([f20884b](https://github.com/bdougie/contributor.info/commit/f20884b5203352bfaf215d60392f8fa1eeb3fb2f))

üêõ Bug Fixes
